headline: Why West Pharmaceutical Services (WST) Stock Is Nosediving
summary: Shares of healthcare products company West Pharmaceutical Services (NYSE:WST) fell 34.9% in the afternoon session after the company reported disappointing fourth-quarter 2024 results: its full-year revenue and earnings guidance fell short of Wall Street's estimates. Adjusted EPS declined slightly y/y, reflecting margin pressures and a less favorable product mix. These factors contributed to the lower-than-expected full-year EPS guidance.

headline: West Pharmaceutical Stock Sinks On Weaker Than Expected 2025 Guidance
summary: On Thursday, West Pharmaceutical Services, Inc. (NYSE:WST) reported a fourth-quarter adjusted EPS of $1.82, beating the consensus of $1.72. The designer and manufacturer of injectable pharmaceutical packaging and delivery systems reported sales of $748.8 million, beating the consensus of $740.47 million. headline: This Pharma Stock Is Today’s Worst in the S&P 500. Here’s Why.
summary: West Pharmaceutical Services  stock sank Thursday after the company issued a full-year outlook that missed analysts’ expectations.  Shares plunged 31% to $222.46, putting them on pace for their worst same-day percentage decrease in the company’s history.  The sharp downturn made West Pharmaceutical the worst-performing stock in the  on Thursday.

headline: West Pharmaceutical Services (WST) Surpasses Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: West Pharmaceutical (WST) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 4% and 1.25%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: West Pharmaceutical: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.75 per share. The medical device company posted revenue of $748.8 million in the period, also surpassing Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $739.6 million.

raw.headline: West Pharmaceutical: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.75 per share. The medical device company posted revenue of $748.8 million in the period, also surpassing Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $739.6 million.

headline: West Pharmaceutical Services’s (NYSE:WST) Q4: Beats On Revenue But Stock Drops
summary: Healthcare products company West Pharmaceutical Services (NYSE:WST) reported Q4 CY2024 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 2.3% year on year to $748.8 million. On the other hand, the company’s full-year revenue guidance of $2.89 billion at the midpoint came in 5% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.82 per share was 5.3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: West Announces Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2024 Results
summary: West Pharmaceutical Services, Inc. (NYSE: WST) today announced its financial results for the fourth-quarter and full-year 2024 and introduced 2025 financial guidance.
